unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Decoding Your Desi Audience**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Decoding Your Desi Audience**

unnormalised: Ever wondered if your Insta reels are truly resonating beyond your immediate circle in, say, Kanpur? Well, worry no more! Follower analytics are getting a serious desi upgrade, offering insights beyond basic likes and comments.
normalised: Ever wondered if your Insta reels are truly resonating beyond your immediate circle in, say, Kanpur? Well, worry no more! Follower analytics are getting a serious desi upgrade, offering insights beyond basic likes and comments.

unnormalised: Imagine knowing exactly when most of your followers in Mumbai are online – say, 7:30 PM after their chai break! New tools are drilling down to location-specific engagement patterns. Think beyond just "India" and get to the heart of whether your content is vibing with the Gen Z crowd in Delhi University or the more mature audience prepping for dinner at 09:00 hrs in Chennai.
normalised: Imagine knowing exactly when most of your followers in Mumbai are online – say, seven thirty P M after their chai break! New tools are drilling down to location-specific engagement patterns. Think beyond just "India" and get to the heart of whether your content is vibing with the Generation Z crowd in Delhi University or the more mature audience prepping for dinner at zero nine hundred hours in Chennai.

unnormalised: Several homegrown startups are now offering services that track follower demographics, interests (hello, Bollywood obsession!), and even preferred languages. Forget generalized advice, these analytics help you tailor content for maximum impact. One report, dated 26/01/2024, indicated a 30% increase in engagement for influencers using location-specific captions. Time to ditch the generic hashtags and get granular! Want to know more? Check out the session happening on 15/08/2023 at IIT Bombay at 10:00 AM.
normalised: Several homegrown startups are now offering services that track follower demographics, interests (hello, Bollywood obsession!), and even preferred languages. Forget generalized advice, these analytics help you tailor content for maximum impact. One report, dated twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four, indicated a thirty percent increase in engagement for influencers using location-specific captions. Time to ditch the generic hashtags and get granular! Want to know more? Check out the session happening on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three at I I T Bombay at ten A M.
